full_threads.body:
Help Pellumb understand how they’re doing:

Rate your conversation

https://static.intercom-mail.com/assets/ratings/rating-1-60x60-at-2x-cc6116cc4574ac8e283a60089d2361e96011d816a2db7166bd9889e384d5c568.png https://static.intercom-mail.com/assets/ratings/rating-2-60x60-at-2x-c5ee794dd37323f8c376be7ecae997254c060663be96cdc9b51af65702744b55.png https://static.intercom-mail.com/assets/ratings/rating-3-60x60-at-2x-4ca083c0a210db4fc8ad18d8c491ce4e74da65117b9bd6d534f697912a5b9005.png https://static.intercom-mail.com/assets/ratings/rating-4-60x60-at-2x-96270f90826bff485ba88c83f0a2294224466d1f721872bc23c879ddd2312883.png https://static.intercom-mail.com/assets/ratings/rating-5-60x60-at-2x-e182d0473f839f9bde196b2b1fdd50fef6c8179e75e09558bcbf29ce3d94f51e.png

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 09:35 PM, "Pellumb Dalipi" <pellumb.dalipi@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Hello there, so the plan upgrade seems to have completed successfully. If you need any further help, just let us know. For now, I wish you a great day!

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 06:28 PM, "Pellumb Dalipi" <pellumb.dalipi@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Alright!

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 06:27 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Ok sure, thanks!

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 06:19 PM, "Pellumb Dalipi" <pellumb.dalipi@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Hello there,

I did check with my team and they said it's a very normal process. Due to the many sites you have, the script runs through all of them and adds the configuration details, so this usually can take a while.

I will check at the end of my shift again, and if this should not be resolved by then, I will escalate it to our system team again.

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 06:19 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Hey Pellumb, I just had a thought, the accounts team gave us up to 90 sites on the 80 site plan. Perhaps this has caused the delay/issue?

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:10 PM, "Pellumb Dalipi" <pellumb.dalipi@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Okay, so this means, your plan was already updated. I see that the Activity Log is still loading, this might be some behind the scenes stuff which should not be concerning to you at the moment.

I will check this again in some time to see if everything is alright, but this can usually take some time.

So, from our end, it seems like everything is working correctly.

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:09 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/71857248/c68a3d778ec158b35f570940/Screen+Shot+2018-08-14+at+5.09.06+pm.png

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:08 PM, "Pellumb Dalipi" <pellumb.dalipi@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Under "Billing" what do you see there?

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:08 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Nope, no joy, same thing?

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:07 PM, "Pellumb Dalipi" <pellumb.dalipi@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Alright! I'm here so you can report back when you're done.

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:07 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Ok sure, I'll log out and see if that does the trick. Cheers

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:07 PM, "Pellumb Dalipi" <pellumb.dalipi@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Okay, I assume the website just got stuck somehow. So I would refresh or log out and in again, this should solve the issue. Is there anything else I can help with?

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:06 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Yep

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:06 PM, "Pellumb Dalipi" <pellumb.dalipi@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Is Enterprise 3 your new plan?

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:06 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Thanks

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:06 PM, "Pellumb Dalipi" <pellumb.dalipi@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

I will take a look.

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:05 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

*I've upgraded our plan but it's been 'loading' the new plan for at least 5-10mins just want to check that it hasn't timed out or something? Cheers

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:05 PM, "Pellumb Dalipi" <pellumb.dalipi@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Hello there,

how can I help you?

On Tue, Aug 14, 2018 at 05:05 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Hey Guys, I
